Text: As we observe #BHM, new analysis from @TheBlackCaucus and @JECDems shows positive economic progress for Black Americans, but barriers remain. We must work to ensure disparities for Black workers and families are addressed once and for all. https://t.co/INe7Ecm7nF #JECxCBC https://t.co/auqYrE1D8k

Prince George‚Äôs Cty residents can find free COVID-19 test kits & KN95 masks right in their neighborhood. Libraries, community centers, & testing facilities & clinics are distributing 2 masks & 2 kits per person over the age of 2. For more info, click here: https://t.co/nOHLuGGNEU

I join in remembering the incredible life and legacy of Dr. Paul Farmer. I extend my condolences to his loved ones and all those he touched with his important work around the world through Partners in Health. https://t.co/ZnmqbIKExU

In rejecting the former president‚Äôs effort to prevent the release of key documents relating to the @January6thCmte investigation into the Capitol insurrection, SCOTUS made clear that the truths of that day must be told & that justice must be served. https://t.co/Z5R83zPKki

Thanks to the¬†National Guard and the Piscataway Tribe, a popup vaccine clinic will be at the St. Ignatius Church on 2/24, from 3-7 p.m. to continue equitably vaccinating residents. I encourage those who haven‚Äôt yet gotten vaccinated in the Nanjemoy area to stop by. https://t.co/3tzMBJAWB3

Vladimir Putin is taking dangerous actions that violate Ukraine‚Äôs sovereignty, reduce the possibility of a diplomatic solution, & open the door to further invasion. Read my full statement on Russian aggression against Ukraine here: https://t.co/3j0aKyci6R

Yesterday would have been my brother John Lewis‚Äô 82nd birthday. John dedicated his life to ensuring every American could achieve full freedom & equality. As we remember him, we must not let his work to secure the right to vote go unfinished & enact legislation to #RestoreTheVote. https://t.co/hfm2bBIwd5

Happy birthday to my friend @RepRaulGrijalva. Thank you for your leadership and dedication to managing and protecting our nation's most treasured natural resources and public lands for Arizonans and all Americans to experience and enjoy as the Chair of @NRDems.

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend @RepMaloney from #NY12, a tireless advocate to ensure our government is transparent and accountable #ForThePeople as Chair of @OversightDems. I am grateful for your leadership in passing the bipartisan #PostalServiceReformAct.

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend @RepHuffman from #CA02 today. I am grateful for your leadership in managing & protecting America's water resources as Chair of @NRDems' Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife & your work to #ActOnClimate as a Member of @ClimateCrisis.

Every year I leave the #MD05 & #MD04 #BHM Breakfast feeling uplifted & inspired ‚Äì & this year was no different! I thank each one of our guests this past weekend & everyone who tuned in. If you couldn‚Äôt make it, take a look at some of the highlights from our speakers & performers: https://t.co/wFG9S4j5GS

.@replawrence is a staunch defender of MI manufacturing & an advocate for a skilled workforce. With her help passing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act last month, she continues to support & strengthen manufacturing innovation & jobs training for all Michiganders. #MakeItInAmerica https://t.co/E87K0en2b8
Mr. Moses is a true hero. I appreciate his voice on my office‚Äôs Academy Board and thank him for his contributions to our community, which have made a difference for so many of our veterans.

I join in saluting Mr. Mike Moses for his service to our country and congratulate him for being honored this #BHM by the La Plata Police Department as a Local Community Difference Maker. https://t.co/JoO4xIya1I

Have you ordered your free COVID-19 tests? Americans can order up to 4 free at-home rapid antigen test kits to test themselves & their families. Orders will be delivered within 7-12 days and every household is eligible. Order yours today at: https://t.co/ZfMzPX9VHI https://t.co/dqNVxslATY

Happy birthday to my friend @RepDelBene from #WA01. As Chair of @NewDemCoalition, you have been a leader in expanding economic opportunity for America‚Äôs working families and I am grateful for your work advocating for the expanded #ChildTaxCredit as Vice Chair of @WaysMeansCmte.

I‚Äôm a proud supporter of Home Rule, which ensures DC can maintain its autonomy. GOP threats to take away the District‚Äôs freedom to self-govern are anti-democratic & reinforce the need for #DCStatehood & equal representation for the over 700,000 Americans living in the District. https://t.co/jXDvMj2QtA

Too many Marylanders have struggled to access unemployment benefits during the pandemic. That‚Äôs why I joined Team MD in urging the @MD_Labor to apply for a new program funded by the American Rescue Plan to improve the state‚Äôs unemployment insurance system. https://t.co/27GXe6bSpv

Ed Burroughs is a man of extraordinary talent who continues to show up on behalf of Prince George‚Äôs County. I was glad to join him & others at his swearing in ceremony & have full faith that he will serve the residents of District 8 on the Cty Council w leadership & dedication. https://t.co/xHHxcFaFlH

We must safeguard America's full faith and credit. To prevent financial catastrophe that would hurt American businesses and working families, I continue to urge Congress to significantly de-weaponize the near-constant threat of default posed by the debt limit in its current form. https://t.co/EjA58kdNQF

This morning, I delivered remarks before @HouseBudgetDems on the financial risks the debt limit poses to America‚Äôs economy and the growing consensus behind deweaponizing and reforming this arbitrary limit.  https://t.co/rLfxmlaKjN

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend @RepKathleenRice, who has been a champion for #NY04 as a Member of @EnergyCommerce and @HomelandDems. I will miss you in Congress next year and wish you the best with your next chapter.

Glad to see @StateDept reaffirm the U.S.‚Äô commitment to the Ukrainian people by offering a sovereign loan guarantee up to $1 billion. The American people, & our democratic partners, continue to stand with Ukraine amid Russia‚Äôs unprecedented aggression. https://t.co/SnGJimzFlz

Too many Americans have been impacted by gun violence & I continue to urge the Senate to act on the common-sense reforms including the House-passed #HR8 & legislation to close the #CharlestonLoophole that will help #EndGunViolence and keep our communities safe.

As we mark four years since the Parkland shooting, our country continues to mourn the seventeen lives lost to a senseless act of gun violence. Today & everyday, we stand‚ÄØwith the victims' families & survivors & continue the work to keep our communities safe & #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/X8wS0Z0hLx

Had a terrific time at the #BHMBreakfast41 with the MD community & special guest @RepUnderwood! If you weren‚Äôt able to tune in & hear the inspiring speeches, including Dr. Kizzmekia Corbett, or listen to the musical performances, find the full program here:https://t.co/G24PJU4UTK

Today, I joined @OversightDems Govt Operations Subcommittee virtually & testified on behalf of folks in #MD05 who continue to experience postal service issues. I thank the committee for allowing me to participate & their efforts to address postal delays. https://t.co/C1DyYba1Xx

Happy birthday to my friend @RepAngieCraig from #MN02. I am grateful for your work to promote policies that ensure family farms and small businesses have the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica as a member of @HouseAgDems, @EnergyCommerce, and @HouseSmallBiz.

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend @RepRichardNeal, Chair of the @WaysMeansCmte. Thank you for your leadership on the #BuildBackBetter Act to create a fairer tax system, lower costs for working families, and strengthen the middle class with jobs that pay well.

Folks across #MD05 are rightfully frustrated with @USPS delivery delays. Earlier today, I wrote to Postmaster General DeJoy about USPS reliability across #MD05 and urged him to take action to address them as soon as possible. Read my full letter here: https://t.co/0WrosEU5QY https://t.co/4KqVPLFQ1E
Wishing a happy birthday to @RepFilemonVela. Thank you for your tireless service for South Texas on @HouseAgDems and @HASCDemocrats, I will miss you in Congress next year.
Happy birthday to my good friend @RepFletcher. Thank you for your leadership in ensuring Texans are served by more reliable, resilient electric grids as a member of @EnergyCommerce and @HouseScience.

For 41 years I‚Äôve been honored to help bring the #MD05 community together with the annual #BlackHistoryMonth Breakfast, a time to reflect on how far we‚Äôve come and acknowledge the long road ahead toward a more perfect union. https://t.co/L65RXket5E

I am so thrilled to join friends, leaders, and #MD05 residents this morning at the #BHMBreakfast41! You can still RSVP to hear from our keynote speaker, Dr. Corbett, about Black health & wellness in our communities. https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/L4ObcRFDbU

Pleased to announce $9.3 million from the bipartisan infrastructure law for electric charging vehicles in MD. Team Maryland will continue to fight for federal investments in better, cleaner transportation infrastructure. https://t.co/Sr0yrFiDfb

.@RepEBJ testified during my 2015 panel about investments in manufacturing R&D & education. I am grateful for her sponsorship & advocacy of the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, which will enhance our nation's ability to strategically improve our competitiveness in the global economy. https://t.co/rNJtDJrkkX

.@RepScottPeters highlighted the connection of innovation and research and investment in renewable energy in San Diego while speaking at a #MakeItInAmerica panel in 2015. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will accelerate and bolster renewable energy research across the country. https://t.co/xO27ueIMTc

There is no stronger advocate for NW and Central Illinois' manufacturing triangle than @repcheri. Her support of the #AmericaCOMPETES Act will help workers in #IL17 and across America to get the skills they need through investments in training and education. #MakeItInAmerica https://t.co/j68bN0xM13

This year‚Äôs #BHM theme is Black Health and Wellness, and I am so glad that my friend @RepUnderwood is joining us at the #BHMBreakfast41 to bring awareness to the importance of this topic in our communities. Register today: https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/ZxYvkw418R

Can‚Äôt wait to join my partner @RepAnthonyBrown in Prince George‚Äôs for the #BHMBreakfast41! If you haven‚Äôt yet, RSVP today using the link below. RT if you‚Äôve already RSVP‚Äôd and tell a friend to do the same! https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/gbcJAegvwm

The House-passed #AmericaCOMPETES Act enacts portions of the #MakeItInAmerica plan to revitalize America‚Äôs research, innovation, & manufacturing sectors, giving workers the tools to succeed & making our economy more prosperous for all.  https://t.co/KBzwGjTwvd

.@RepSeanMaloney has been a fighter for small businesses in the Hudson Valley for years. His help in passing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, which helps small businesses access capital, will help give more entrepreneurs access to the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica. https://t.co/bx4oKiW6rH

In 1995, @EricHolder joined folks in #MD05 for our annual Black History Month Breakfast and later became the 82nd Attorney General of the United States. #BHMBreakfast41 is just days away! Register today: https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/x5l28d8suH

.@JacksonLeeTX18 testified during my 2015 #MIIA panel on the importance of education and skills training. Her vote for the #AmericaCOMPETES Act shows her dedication to helping Texans and Americans across the country better prepare for jobs in the 21st Century economy. https://t.co/GgYGJamatY

This Saturday we are celebrating #BHMBreakfast41, but it wasn‚Äôt too long ago that @donnabrazile joined us in Maryland for the 2001 Black History Month Breakfast! We are glad to keep this important local tradition alive virtually this year. RSVP today at: https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/lOBkUdzzhF

I am pleased that @POTUS will propose a 4.6% pay raise for federal employees & military service members in his upcoming budget. I will continue fighting & advocating for our federal workforce so that our country can recruit & retain the brightest minds. https://t.co/FBU0kpURtc

Happy birthday to my friend from Delaware, @RepLBR. Thank you for your dedication to promoting access to education & entrepreneurship opportunities that give American workers the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica as founder of the Congressional Future of Work Caucus.

.@RepGaramendi has long been a supporter of the #MakeItInAmerica plan & participated in a 2015 panel I hosted on the future of manufacturing. With the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, we are making important strides to increase our competitiveness, especially within manufacturing. https://t.co/d06w5LPcwK

As the first African American to serve as the @LibnOfCongress, I am thankful to have welcomed Dr. Carla Hayden to #MD05 in 2017 for the annual Black History Month Breakfast. We are still taking RSVPs for this Saturday‚Äôs #BHMBreakfast41, RSVP here: https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/VnU2bPmmc6

In 2015, @RepBonamici highlighted local businesses in #OR01 struggling to find trained workers at hearings on the #MIIA agenda. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act takes action to close the skills gap, expanding access to career pathways & preparing our young people to take on STEM careers. https://t.co/KiaJUSnh62

In 2015, @GKButterfield testified at my #MakeItInAmerica hearing about his strong advocacy for growing and diversifying the #InnovationEconomy. Last week, House Dems passed the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, which will lower barriers for underrepresented groups in STEM. https://t.co/9bi87jvHmn

In 1989, my dear brother John Lewis spoke at the Black History Month Breakfast. As we celebrate #BHMBreakfast41, I remember him and his work to encourage every American to get into #GoodTrouble. https://t.co/syCOVXVaFy https://t.co/a9wM5BiGLJ

Today, I testified at the @HouseOversight Subcommittee‚Äôs hearing on @WMATA and expressed what so many of my constituents in #MD05 are feeling: WMATA must do a better job making Metro safer and more reliable. https://t.co/KZejOsdcwk https://t.co/fC8cnCTk8Y

As Congress continues talks on the newly-named #MakeItInAmerica Act, I‚Äôm glad to see this bill meet the goals of expanding education & entrepreneurship opportunities for American workers, as the #MakeItInAmerica agenda has focused on for over a decade. https://t.co/6NQuUJY2ux

I‚Äôm proud to bring @RepCicilline‚Äôs #GlobalRespectAct to the Floor today. This legislation affirms that hate has no place in the U.S., and will deny visas to those who commit human rights abuses against LGBTQ people abroad. I urge my colleagues to vote yes on this critical bill. https://t.co/Oh90VCcLjM

Modernizing Congress through a House Digital Service will improve our transparency & accountability to the American people. I am glad to see the idea I first introduced some years ago coming to the House permanently & thank the @ModernizeCmte for their work on this priority. https://t.co/22m5GOHo4m

Every year, the #MD04 & #MD05 Black History Month Breakfast brings together extraordinary keynote speakers. In 2006, then @BarackObama delivered the keynote address. Register today for the #BHMBreakfast41 happening this Saturday! https://t.co/syCOVXVIv6 https://t.co/xvL5Qa5Cxy

Today's House-passed C.R. is premised on an understanding that the House & Senate Approps Committees are close to an agreement on the parameters for an omnibus funding package that will be ready no later than March 8. I am determined to bring an omnibus to the Floor by that date.

The C.R. passed by the House today reflects our Majority‚Äôs determination to ensure that the work of government is not disrupted by a shutdown. I look forward to bringing an omnibus bill to the Floor soon so we can fund the government for FY22. https://t.co/QSfekSnXnf

I am honored to welcome Dr. Kizzmekia Corbett to the #BHMBreakfast41 this year! As a leading immuniologist Dr. Corbett‚Äôs work played a tremendous role in developing the COVID-19 vaccines. RSVP here: https://t.co/syCOVXVIv6 https://t.co/viCSDWSdZa

I spoke on the Floor today in support of the bipartisan #PostalServiceReform Act, which help ensure @USPS has the resources needed to continue to provide important services to Americans‚Äì  including keeping them in touch & delivering goods & services. I urge a strong yes vote. https://t.co/S5y06wuT7u

The #MakeItInAmerica agenda has always focused on creating good-paying jobs & building better lives for working families. I‚Äôm proud to see this crucial legislation to promote America's economic competitiveness & revitalize manufacturing get a great new name to match! https://t.co/hItwv9IRmq

Finally, I said to reporters that the RNC‚Äôs censure of Reps. Cheney and Kinzinger for telling the truth was inexplicable. To call what happened on January 6th anything other than dangerous to our democracy is an undermining of our Constitution.

I said to press that last Friday‚Äôs #JobsReport capped off a historic year of job growth, w/ nearly half a million jobs created in Jan ‚Äò22 alone. House Dems passed the #AmericaCOMPETES Act that same day to unlock even more opportunity for workers & businesses to #MakeItInAmerica.

I also told reporters that House Democrats remain focused on advancing important priorities #ForThePeople this week, including bills to reform @USPS in a bipartisan fashion, #EndForcedArbitration, and affirm our commitment to LGBTQ rights worldwide.

I told reporters during my weekly press conference that I am bringing a short-term Continuing Resolution to the Floor today to fund the government through March 11 as omnibus negotiations continue. I continue to urge appropriators to move quickly to reach agreement on an omnibus.

Tonight, I will bring @RepCheri‚Äôs legislation to the House Floor which would #EndForcedArbitration and help ensure that survivors of sexual assault and harassment are not blocked from seeking justice. I urge my colleagues to vote yes on this crucial bill.

Wishing a happy birthday to my friend @RepBonnie from #NJ12, a leader in the work to amplify the voices of Black women and girls in policy as co-chair of the @CBWGCaucus and as a terrific member of @AppropsDems and @HomelandDems.
Happy birthday to my friend @CongBoyle. Thank you for your advocacy on behalf of Philadelphia‚Äôs working families as a Member of @WaysMeansCmte and as co-chair of @BlueCollarDems.

I joined @TheSundayShow with @CapehartJ to discuss House Democrats‚Äô legislative accomplishments this Congress and our ongoing work to deliver #ForThePeople. Watch my interview here: https://t.co/bKCKHBNHRQ

I‚Äôm joining @TheSundayShow with @CapehartJ at 11:00 a.m. this morning to discuss the #AmericaCOMPETES Act and House Democrats' efforts to ensure our working families and businesses have the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica. Watch live here: https://t.co/HvkRs3O5aN

Glad to discuss important #MD05 priorities ‚Äì including protecting voting rights & how the bipartisan infrastructure law will create jobs here in Maryland ‚Äì with @TasminMahfuz on @WDVMTV‚Äôs #CapitolReview. Watch my full interview ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/4t42M7z12i

Glad to share the first Friday of #BHM with @CollectiveEmpow during their morning breakfast. I thank each of the CEG leaders who participated yesterday & look forward to continuing our discussions in the future to help meet the economic needs of our people.https://t.co/PD4Q1GzkrJ

Thank you @RepFletcher for your leadership to ensure that the #AmericaCOMPETES Act makes our electrical grid less vulnerable and more reliable for residents in #TX07 and across the country. https://t.co/fcVwhg9tQv

Thank you @RepDelgado for your leadership in championing the domestic production of semiconductors through your 4x4 plan & your amendment to ensure we manufacture more of this critical technology here at home. https://t.co/zVw1zgX9it

Tune in tomorrow at noon on @WDVMTV to hear me speak with @TasminMahfuz about the need to protect voting rights, how the bipartisan infrastructure law is helping #MD05, & everything Democrats are doing to ensure Marylanders have the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica. https://t.co/SMayD80Xv2

I joined @RepBarbaraLee & Members of the Task Force on Poverty & Opportunity for a roundtable with health experts to discuss the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on mental health challenges facing children in poverty. Learn more about our conversation here: https://t.co/sbirXihRGE

Happy birthday to @SanfordBishop from #GA02. I am grateful for your leadership in promoting sustainable agriculture and economic opportunity in rural areas as Chair of the @AppropsDems Subcommittee on Agriculture, Rural Development, & Food and Drug Administration.

I want to thank @RepEBJ and the other chairs whose committees had a hand in assembling this bill, which drew from many of the policies recommended in the #MakeItInAmerica plan for jobs and opportunity, which I have been proud to lead for over a decade.

Today, the House passed the #AmericaCOMPETES Act of 2022, major legislation to boost the competitiveness of U.S. businesses & workers which brings together many of the best ideas from both sides of the aisle to help more of our people #MakeItInAmerica.  https://t.co/DbXXEAHv9T

As we mark #BHM2022, I am glad that @HouseJudiciary is examining a special African American tradition today: Lift Every Voice and Sing, a song I greatly respect and enjoy and feature at the #MD05 Black History Month Breakfast every year. I encourage folks to tune in here: https://t.co/HkY4JDhoc0

We need to sustain this momentum, and I am proud that the House is taking action to pass the #AmericaCOMPETES Act today, which will address major issues like strengthening our supply chains and helping more Americans learn in-demand job skills.

The January #JobsReport is proof that Democrats‚Äô economic policies are getting our economy back on track, with a record 6.6 million jobs created since @POTUS took office and nearly half a million in January alone.  https://t.co/nZ6qbEpHyT

With nearly half a million jobs created during Jan '22, @POTUS & House Dems' jobs agenda is working. Today, the House will continue that mission by passing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, which will give folks pathways to good-paying jobs & the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica.

By accelerating domestic manufacturing & expanding pathways to STEM careers, the #AmericaCOMPETES Act will counter inflation & prevent supply chain vulnerabilities while giving folks the tools they need to build better lives for their families & #MakeItInAmerica. https://t.co/ewMsCtVNYb

From creating career pathways in STEM, to revitalizing our manufacturing sector & creating jobs, the #AmericaCOMPETES Act will counter inflation & make our economy more competitive & prosperous for all, giving our workers & businesses the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica. https://t.co/V2ddUlAahI

As we celebrate #BHM2022, I am thrilled to participate in the 41st #MD05 and #MD04 Black History Month Breakfast! Every year this is my favorite event of the month and I hope you will join me virtually next Saturday at 10:00 a.m. RSVP today: https://t.co/ErqbuulQFp https://t.co/6D2coK0p0v

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will accelerate domestic manufacturing of critical goods like semiconductor chips and connect our nation's students and workers with the skills necessary to #MakeItInAmerica, countering inflation and expanding economic opportunity. https://t.co/02hINBw2dV

Wishing a happy birthday to @RepPressley. Thank you for ensuring equity is central as we craft and consider legislation #ForThePeople and for delivering results on behalf of #MA07 constituents as a Member of @OversightDems and @FSCDems.

I commend the outstanding work of our troops who carried out the dangerous mission last night that eliminated the threat posed by Abu Ibrahim al-Hashimi al-Qurayshi. Read my full statement: https://t.co/P8lZjYVkSq

.@RepDelBene and @NewDemCoalition are right. 

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act includes bipartisan priorities that will ensure workers and businesses have the tools they need to #MakeItInAmerica and keep our economy competitive globally for decades to come. https://t.co/rC9YVShF06

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will accomplish the goals of my #MakeItInAmerica agenda & ensure workers have the tools needed to build better lives for their families while countering inflation & strengthening economic competitiveness.

My op-ed in @TheHill: https://t.co/J64vVFPPWm

I wrote to Attorney General Garland and Homeland Security @SecMayorkas to urge for a complete investigation into the recent bomb threats against HBCUs around the country, including in #MD05. Read my full letter here: https://t.co/y3e6jDgy5n https://t.co/35mJj82arU
Read my statement on Amnesty International‚Äôs recent report on Israel below: https://t.co/vARmye1X40

This legislation will not only make our economy more competitive abroad but will also deliver economic opportunity to working families by creating good-paying manufacturing jobs and expanding access to STEM education and skills training to ensure more folks can #MakeItInAmerica.

Within the #AmericaCOMPETES Act, there are at least 63 bills with GOP co-sponsors, 29 of which have passed the House by bipartisan vote. Republicans ought to join Democrats in growing American competitiveness & jobs by passing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act. https://t.co/niCPb9RJKh

Across the nation, roads, bridges, airports, & water systems will be rebuilt, upgraded, & expanded, creating millions of well-paid jobs, many of them union jobs, in the process, a crucial investment in U.S. workers & communities to ensure more of our folks can #MakeItInAmerica.

As of today, House Democrats have now held over 1,000 events on the enactment of the bipartisan infrastructure law and its benefits for workers and families in communities across our nation, highlighting how #DemocratsDeliver results #ForThePeople.  https://t.co/1qHIxAP2c4

I also told press about the productive Floor schedule for the February work period. In addition to #AmericaCOMPETES, the House will advance critical legislation & continue our work on an omnibus; I urge appropriators to reach agreement on gov't funding before February 18th.

This #AmericaCOMPETES Act reflects bipartisan needs to continue our economic recovery. I urge every Member who is invested in supporting American workers & helping our economy recover to support this bill on the Floor & help build a more competitive, prosperous economy for all.

I told reporters during my weekly press conference that today the House will begin consideration of legislation that reflects the pillars of my #MakeItInAmerica plan & strengthens our manufacturing sector, fights inflation, & fixes our supply chains: the #AmericaCOMPETES Act.

A strong U.S. manufacturing sector is key to preventing shortages of critical goods that contribute to rising prices.  

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will help counter inflationary pressures & create good-paying manufacturing jobs to ensure more of our workers can #MakeItInAmerica. https://t.co/lnDnhyBYWo

I am glad to bring the #AmericaCOMPETES Act up for a vote, continuing the #MakeItInAmerica agenda that I have been proud to lead for more than a decade & building a more competitive, prosperous economy for all.

As I said in 2018, the #MakeItInAmerica plan aims to ensure folks have access to the opportunities in education, entrepreneurship, & infrastructure they need to get ahead in today‚Äôs economy. https://t.co/ATRLh7OleP

Up next, I joined @RepRonKind in Eau Claire, WI to talk with biz owners about creating jobs here at home with a renewed focus on entrepreneurship & education opportunities‚Äîpriorities reflected in the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law & #AmericaCOMPETES Act. https://t.co/6gCuAkGjVv

.@RepMarkPocan & I heard from small biz owners in Madison, WI about diversifying & expanding access to capital. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will help historically disadvantaged communities reach their full economic potential through #RegionalInnovationHubs. https://t.co/aCPX5O96d5

Our tour continued in #Indianapolis where @RepAndreCarson, @RepBarragan, & I heard from local leaders about infrastructure successes & challenges. Conversations on the #ListeningTour informed our agenda to build economic opportunity for working families. https://t.co/2q7yVL1qbX

In 2018, I joined @RepMarcyKaptur & @RepBarragan for a roundtable in Toledo w/ local leaders to discuss new ways to close the skills gap. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will expand access to apprenticeships & create STEM pathways to give folks tools to #MIIA. https://t.co/IwyEJYc49w

On my 2nd #ListeningTour, @USRepMikeDoyle & I visited a business incubator in Pittsburgh to learn how workforce development centers help entrepreneurs #MIIA. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act makes crucial investments in incubators for clean energy tech & STEM. https://t.co/DOC1N5j3DD

I discussed the need for skills training & apprenticeships in 2017 w/ @RepCheri & @RepJimmyPanetta; the #AmericaCOMPETES Act includes provisions from the #NationalApprenticeshipAct creating pipelines from classrooms & training centers into full-time jobs. https://t.co/Es30e0jOWO

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act will ignite entrepreneurship by focusing government investments in the tech of the future. Back in 2017, @RepCleaver, @RepJimmyPanetta, & I heard from Kansas City entrepreneurs about how to unleash small biz growth. https://t.co/EF0wfoYtih

In Nov. '17, I was in Las Vegas with @RepDinaTitus, where Southern NV community leaders told us how tech is changing infrastructure needs. The #AmericaCOMPETES Act helps to realize this goal by revitalizing research infrastructure & promoting opportunity. https://t.co/fOc5pAqoTe

Several of the goals included in the #MIIA plan are now law thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, including crucial investments in infrastructure & education by promoting workforce training programs. Now, we are advancing the rest of our plan w/ the #AmericaCOMPETES Act.

In 2017 & 2018, I traveled across the country on a #MakeItInAmerica #ListeningTour where I joined Dems to hear from their communities about the economic challenges they face & the tools they need to expand opportunity. These discussions informed a revitalized #MIIA agenda.

Launched in 2010 to revitalize U.S. manufacturing, today‚Äôs #MIIA plan drew off of input from a 2015 hearing series. Panelists including innovators, entrepreneurs, & economists told House Dems that education, entrepreneurship, & infrastructure would help folks get ahead. https://t.co/uftDu82eJS

This week, I'm bringing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act to the Floor, expanding U.S. innovation, technology, & manufacturing & advancing the priorities of House Dems' #MakeItInAmerica Agenda that I've been proud to lead for more than a decade. THREADüßµ: https://t.co/NxCdVyBDrV
